price: (34) That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿīsā ub'nu maryama qawla al-ḥaqi alladhī fīhi yamtarūna
